comments.body: So, I picked one version of `python`, but am not sure if we should be using more and making `python` a run-time dependency or not.

comments.body: This downloads the binary for Windows. Basically we need MSYS2 to build from source. So, I'm going to let someone else give that a try. Though this may be a good learning experience.
